Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: A big surprise near touristic quarter. The ambiance is nice, the food is very good, I liked the romantic candles inside !

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Really great little local restaurant bar. I was greeting with a handshake by the manager and sat at a cute little table and ordered the snails (delicious) and duck salad (lettuce was strange and the dish a little weird but traditional so ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Dishes around 20 euro, friendly staff, good beers and great duck breast. When you are with a bigger group you definitely need a reservation. During weekends and high season too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: It's a really good restaurant. The atmosphere of the restaurant is incredible. Food is undoubtedly delicious and waitress were friendly but they were a bit slow which I don't blame them because there were so many customers. I would love to come back some time with my friends who want to have some classic Dutch food.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Yes, the other local guides are right. This a warm place with friendly staff.  The food is great and the price honest.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Wonderful atmosphere, delicious food and great service. Went here on the recommendation of Abby at the Mauro Mansion, and glad he did. Delicious and healthy well-crafted dishes.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Amazing food with fair selection of alcohol. This restaurant is very popular so mind that when planning. Probably the best duck breast I have ever tried.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text:
Beautiful food, great service and a very appropriate price.

Would definitely recommend and will be visiting again soon!

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text:
This place is Amsterdam, the food is flawless. Atmosphere is inviting and warm.
Service is great. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Great food (the ribs and the spring roll were particular highlights), nice drink selection, helpful staff and comfortable surroundings. Can't really go wrong! Might want to book a table, as can be packed, even midweek.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Best restaurant I've tried in Amsterdam (by far), staff is really kind and professional even when it get busy. Food is fresh, of quality and is not too expensive. I recommend!!

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Very good restaurant. Simple food cooked from the heart. Flavorful and affordable. Emma was very helpful in getting us comfortable and recommending additional places off the beaten path to see. Thank you! And keep in mind there is another "cafe van Beeren" that is simply an old bar. This is the real deal.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Lovely place, very nice food served outside in their enclosed garden. Mainly locals eating here, which is always a good sign. We were recommended and it didn't disappoint.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Delicious local Dutch food - really indulgent dinner, cosy traditional wood-panelled pub, full of locals and buzzing atmosphere. Try the game stew or the duck breast. Amazing.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: First time in Amsterdam. A laid back, cozy place where you can grab a quick meal and a few beers. The place seems to be crowded with local people, which means tourists won't be an annoyance. The personell are friendly and helpful, and open ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Visited at 11 am and asked for 2 beers and were given 2 large beers .  In Holland it's usual to get small beers.   Drink prices blacked out on the menu.   Charged 12 euros   Toilet dirty.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Great atmosphere, relaxed but professional, matched by very good food and wine list. Very friendly staff and good value. Brilliant first night in Amsterdam.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Awesome cafe with a great menu, friendly staff and served outside in a cute terrace if you're lucky enough to find a seat ! Whole Dorade was cooked well, side salad was nice and fresh but the risotto was a little sticky, good flavours though.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Amazing place with excellent food for fair prices and friendly staff. The location is a little off the beaten path but that is a good thing, because it still has a local feel to it.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: This place has it all: real fresh ingredients, well prepared, a free caraf of water from the start and fantastic staff. Not to forget the garden where dining in the summer is unforgettable

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Spare ribs were great but fish  was a little tasteless. They have a courtyard in the back which is perfect place to sit in summer.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Great food.  We beat the rush and was kind of them to accommodate us when reservations were full.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Realy a very good restaurant. The atmosphere, the food, the waiters.... Everthing is perfect and in balance. Just a must do!!

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: It's been a few years since my visit, but I had so much fun there I became a regular each night after my sight seeing!  Great staff and even the owner was jovial. :-)

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text:
Awesome food.
Awesome atmosphere
Awesome staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Food was nice. Staff was friendly. Cute quirky little outside seating area, just a little cramped

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Reasonably priced good food, good service, great atmosphere. Nice place that I will recommend to friends.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Great! Enjoyed valuable time in the brown caf√©. Good food and drinks. Also good service!

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Food was good and staff nice. The advantage was to eat outside in a lovely backyard

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Stopped here for some beers, the beer was fresh, the service was quick and the location is in a busy street (we sat outside), so pretty cool place to stop for a drink.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Food was delicious, a good place to eat a good beef! The atmosphere was great as well

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Great cuisine, excellent atmosphere, jazz music & onest prices.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: We go here for drinks. The bar has big variety of beers. Nice and cozy place.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Relaxed place with good food and a friendly vibe

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Everything I had was excellent; the asparagus soup, the ribs, and homemade fries. Very friendly staff.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Gorgeous little neighborhood restaurant. Friendly and cosy with a great menu

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Food was wonderful staff were very friendly

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
Review Text: Typical little bar, similar to many in the city. The beer was decent, service was good.

Name: Eetcafe van Beeren
